results.p: Sep 6, 2024 — Virtual reality (VR), the use of computer modeling and simulation that enables a person to interact with an artificial three-dimensional ...

results.t: What is VR? - Virtual Reality in the Classroom - Research guides
results.p: Virtual reality (VR) is a simulated experience that employs 3D near-eye displays and pose tracking to give the user an immersive feel of a virtual world.
